data.actual_result: If you try to move the cursor from right to left it will be open the guild member list
data.expected_result: Moving the cursor should be able without problems
data.short_description: Move the cursor in text area is not possible without borders
data.steps_to_repro: - Type some text in your chat area of a guild - Than hold the text to move the curser - Move the curser from right to left
